Date: Thursday, 2/2/1990
Subject: Fan Reaction
Hello Boss,
Our fans aren't really happy about the loss of Carney Lansford.
The overall fan interest decreases slightly.

Sincerly,
Your PR Director

Date: Monday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Progress of Marty Cordova
Dear Sir,
Marty Cordova is hitting the ball well at A Rancho Cucamonga Quakes!
He has an AVG of .313, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Status of Steve Howard
Dear Sir,
Steve Howard shouldn't play at AA Frisco Rough Riders!
He has an AVG of .184 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director

Dan Gladden
